page.title: 11My Weekend
page.content: Last Sunday I was making a swing with my friend and I jumped off the swing to hide when my sister came on her bike. Accidently I tripped over a tree stump and landed on some glass cutting my hand. There was blood all over my hand so my friend said, "Go to your mum" and she said, "You'll need stitches". We went to the Accident Unit in Chester hospital and we waited half an hour. The doctor said, "We'll put some stitches in it". I asked him if it would hurt and he said, "Sheer agony". When he had put an injection in to numb my hand, he started to put the stitches in and after 40 minutes we came home. He had put four stitches in my cut. When I got home I got 50p for each stitch so my dad gave me Â£2.00.
